attributes.action: Reverse the decision to give Nick Clegg a knighthood, rewarding failure is wrong
attributes.background: Nick Clegg has failed convincingly as a politician, he has bent the truth through his political life to achieve status. His performance has been so morally bankrupt that neither those on the left, the right, the centre, those for Brexit, nor those against can bear his hypocrisy. Don't reward failure

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
